title: Taylor Swift named Artist of the Decade at AMAs and we should all bow down
text:
Taylor Swift is to be named the Artist of the Decade at the AMAs (Picture: Getty)

Taylor Swift is set to be named Artist of the Decade at this year’s American Music Awards.

The Shake It Off singer has had an incredible few years, and has topped it off with a whopper of a gong.

The news was confirmed by the official AMAs account, with a message reading: ‘She’s won more #AMAs than anyone this decade… She’s a five-time 2019 #AMAs nominee… AND she’s performing at this year’s #AMAs LIVE on Nov. 24…

‘@taylorswift13 is our ARTIST OF THE DECADE!’

Not a shabby way to end the month / year / decade.

And right on cue, fans rushed to congratulate the newly crowned Artist of the Decade on the latest accolade she has added to her collection.

She's won more #AMAs than anyone this decade…

She's a five-time 2019 #AMAs nominee…

AND she's performing at this year's #AMAs LIVE on Nov. 24…@taylorswift13 is our ARTIST OF THE DECADE! 💘🦋✨ pic.twitter.com/WdAPBp4JYU — American Music Awards (@AMAs) October 30, 2019

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘Yes!! Taylor Swift is the ARTIST of the Decade,’ one replied.

‘JUST WHEN I FEEL I CAN’T BE MORE PROUD OF HER… CONGRATULATIONS QUEEN @taylorswift13 no one deserves more than you,’ another screamed.

‘OH MY GOD AN ACTUAL LEGEND,’ a follower posted.

While one recalled a message Swifty shared in 2009, praising just how far she’s come.

They added: ‘“It was the end of the decade but the start of an age” I cannot believe we are ending this decade with Taylor becoming the most awarded and THE artist of the decade… Welcome to the new age @taylorswift13.’

She’s had a whopper of a decade (Picture: Rex)

It has been a fabulous few months for the Bad Blood star, who recently celebrated the 13-year anniversary of her self-titled debut album, which she released all the way back in 2006.

Taking to Instagram, she shared a snap of herself performing on a makeshift stage with her 122 million followers, alongside an upload from her sold-out Reputation tour.

‘I said in an interview 13 years ago “I’m just hoping that I have a second album that does as well as the first and someday get to be a headliner, and always be the same person that I started out as”,’ she told fans.

‘Scrolling through your posts today has me feeling all the feelings & I want to thank you.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘Because of you, there was a 2nd 3rd 4th 5th 6th and 7th album.

‘You guys made me into a headliner because you wanted to see me play,’ she added. ‘And your support all these years is what’s helped me stay true to that kid I was when I started out. #13yearsoftaylorswift.’

No, you’re crying!

description: Taylor Swift is set to be named Artist of the Decade at this year’s American Music Awards.
